import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ templateUrl: './basic-page.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class BasicPageComponent { public myForm: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ name: new FormControl(''), price: new FormControl(0), inStorage: new FormControl(0), }) }
